>
[Acute Vision](/Feats.aspx?ID=5806) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 77 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

When you are raging, your visual senses improve, granting you [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).
name: Acute Vision
